head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GOODE, HENRY RUSSELL

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GOODE, HENRY RUSSELL

block.p: GOODE-Henry Russell, on April 30th, 2000. Beloved husband of Blanca Goode. Loving father of Harold and German. Cherished grandfather of Sari, Lucas and Gabrielle. Survived by sister, Audrey, brother, Frederick, and five nieces and nephews; also two more children, Nina and Frederick. Funeral services will be held at St. Augustine Church, Larchmont, NY on Wednesday, May 3rd, at 10 A.M. Interment will follow at Kensico Cemetery, Valhalla. John J. Fox Funeral Home, 914-834-0144.
